price: "Eu não tinha ciência alguma da corte altíssima, quando disputavam."
arabic: مَا كَانَ لِيَ مِنۡ عِلۡمِۭ بِٱلۡمَلَإِ ٱلۡأَعۡلَىٰٓ إِذۡ يَخۡتَصِمُونَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: mā kāna liya min ʿil'min bil-mala-i al-aʿlā idh yakhtaṣimūna
